title: Q2 Checkpoint: Polynomials, Rational Functions & Radicals
description: Cumulative assessment covering polynomial division, Remainder/Factor Theorems, polynomial graphing, rational expressions and equations, asymptotes, radical simplification, rational exponents, and radical equations.

assessmentProblems.question: Is (x - 2) a factor of x³ - 5x² + 8x - 4? Explain.
assessmentProblems.answer: Yes. From the quotient above: x²-4x+4 = (x-2)². Full factoring: (x-1)(x-2)².

assessmentProblems.question: Describe the end behavior of f(x) = -3x⁵ + 2x³ - x.
assessmentProblems.answer: Left up, right down (odd degree, negative leading coefficient)
